thread.title: September Employee Anniversaries Totaling 500 Years of Service Celebrated at Hytrol Conveyor
thread.title_full: September Employee Anniversaries Totaling 500 Years of Service Celebrated at Hytrol Conveyor

author: prbuzz.com
title: September Employee Anniversaries Totaling 500 Years of Service Celebrated at Hytrol Conveyor
text:
Hytrol Conveyor Company, Inc. is proud to recognize the employees celebrating their anniversary of dedicated service to Hytrol. Employees with a September anniversary start date have more than 500 years of service.
Allen Armesteadt, Hytrol CNC Programmer commented, “I started here two weeks after graduating high school. This is a good place to work and there are great opportunities for advancement within the company. The best part of this job is the people I work with. Even if I come to work down in the dumps, they always cheer me up.”
Chris Glenn, VP of Manufacturing and Engineering, noted, “Best wishes and congratulations to our Hytrol Family members that are celebrating milestones with the company. These employees are the building blocks of the company and what set us apart from everyone else. I am so pleased that they decided to commit to working at Hytrol, and blessed to be part of such a team.”

About Hytrol Conveyor Company, Inc.
Hytrol designs and manufactures some of the most advanced conveyor systems in the material handling industry. More than 800 dedicated employees consider themselves a member of the Hytrol family. It is this cultural context that evaporates the notion that conveyors are a commodity. The products and services represent personal integrity and dynamic lean thinking.
The most important asset at Hytrol (www.hytrol.com) is its people. Hytrol provides a high quality of life for employees. Streamlining processes helps employees produce high quality products, delivered on time, at a fair price. Hytrol employees go beyond making and selling equipment. They work hard to develop a deep understanding of each customer’s business in order to recommend the right solution every time. Follow Hytrol on Twitter @hytrol.
